SELECT goodsuid goodsuid, goodsname goodsname, goodsprice goodsprice, goodsContent goodsContent, goodsregdate goodsregdate, goodsSort goodsSort, goodsCustom goodsCustom, goodsTotal goodsTotal, goodsLeft goodsLeft, goodsLike goodsLike, goodspic1 goodspic1, goodspic2 goodspic2 FROM ( SELECT goodsuid goodsuid, goodsname goodsname, goodsprice goodsprice, goodsContent goodsContent, goodsregdate goodsregdate, goodsSort goodsSort, goodsCustom goodsCustom, goodsTotal goodsTotal, goodsLeft goodsLeft, goodsLike goodsLike, goodspic1 goodspic1, goodspic2 goodspic2 FROM SR_GOODS ORDER BY goodsLeft DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 and 8
